Package io.github.izdwuut.yarl.controllers

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.izdwuut.yarl.controllers.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameController

    public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic controller. Provides a default update method fired after every frame is rendered. It also specifies common fields used by every controller: engine (passed either by YARL or any controller) and input.
    Since:
    2017-11-28
    Author:
    Bartosz "izdwuut" Konikiewicz
